## notifyClose() function

This function stops notifications and frees the handle for reuse.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function notifyClose(handle: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  handle | number | The notification handle as returned by [notifyOpen()](./lgpio.notifyopen.md) |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
